name: Awesome framework
body:
# AWESOME_FRAMEWORk


This is a theme framework that i have been using to develop wordpress theme with clients. Its got an inbuilt contact page and am currently working to inbuilt social media widgets and a paypal donation widgets into it.

The sole purpose of this framework is making it helping young developers like myself be able to code on a framework that pass all the checks by themeforest and wordpress 4.0.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
